typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['input/*']) ~> FlatSource
FlatSource sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Column_4
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink4
